text:
How do Threads work within the context of packages? For example, I am using the `Bootstrap` package, and my code looks like this:
```  bs1 = bootstrap(mean, sv[i, :], BalancedSampling(1000))
  bci1 = confint(bs1, NormalConfInt(0.95));```
however, this takes some time to do and was wondering if there is anyway it can use threads to speed it up? (although I am not sure if the code lends itself to threading or not)
